alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:21PM EST until January 10 at 4:03PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Richland and Lexington Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until early this evening. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 115.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 111.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning at 700 AM EST.
